name: tech.eyeware.beam-eye-tracker
description: Add support for the Beam Eye Tracker - Enable immersive and natural camera controls as well as a dynamic HUD that also increases immersion. The Beam Eye Tracker uses only a webcam or smartphone making accessible to many users. Free demo is available on Steam. The plugin also delivers real-time data for foveated rendering, if your rendering pipeline supports it.

samples.description: Contains a basic scene demonstrating head and eye tracking camera controls and an HUD/Canvas which disappears when the user is looking at it for increased immersion. It also logs real-time data usable for foveated rendering (foveated rendering itself is not demonstrated).
